oai:clarin-pl.eu:11321/557;2018-07-26T07:47:30Z;hdl_11321_3;hdl_11321_4;WordnetLoom 2.0;Wroclaw University of Technology;wordnet editor;java;wildfly;docker;mysql;WordneLoom 2.0 executable files for plWordnet 4.0.
Source code available at https://github.com/CLARIN-PL/WordnetLoom

WordnetLoom – is an wordnet editor application built for the needs of the construction of a the largest Polish wordnet called plWordNet. WordnetLoom provides two means of interaction: a form-based, implemented initially, and a visual, graph-based introduced recently. The visual, graph-based interactive presentation of the wordnet structure enables browsing and its direct editing on the structure of lexico-semantic relations and synsets. WordnetLooms works in a distributed environment, i.e. several linguists can work simulanuously from different sites on the same central database.;2018-07-26;toolService;http://hdl.handle.net/11321/557;eng;plWordNet;http://clarin-pl.eu/en/licenses/plwordnet-2/;PUB;text/plain; charset=utf-8;application/octet-stream;application/octet-stream;application/octet-stream;downloadable_files_count: 3;Wrocław University of Technology;http://plwordnet.pwr.wroc.pl/wordnet/

notes:
WordneLoom 2.0 executable files for plWordnet 4.0.
Source code available at https://github.com/CLARIN-PL/WordnetLoom

WordnetLoom – is an wordnet editor application built for the needs of the construction of a the largest Polish wordnet called plWordNet. WordnetLoom provides two means of interaction: a form-based, implemented initially, and a visual, graph-based introduced recently. The visual, graph-based interactive presentation of the wordnet structure enables browsing and its direct editing on the structure of lexico-semantic relations and synsets. WordnetLooms works in a distributed environment, i.e. several linguists can work simulanuously from different sites on the same central database.
title: WordnetLoom 2.0
